Vps_CaptVipParams Struct Reference
VPS Driver API » Capture API » VPS VIP Capture API

VIP parameters used in set/get VIP params IOCTL. More...

#include <vps_captureVip.h>

Vps_CscConfig * cscCfg
 

Detailed Description

VIP parameters used in set/get VIP params IOCTL.

Field Documentation

Vps_CscConfig* Vps_CaptVipParams::cscCfg

CSC config, set NULL to ignore these parameters.

Fvid2_Format Vps_CaptVipParams::inFmt

width:
Input source width, MUST be >= actual or expected video source input width. This represents the scaler input width to be programmed if scaler is used.

height:
Input source height, MUST be >= actual or expected video source input height. This represents the scaler input height to be programmed if scaler is used.
Height should be field height in case source is interlaced
Height should be frame height in case source is progressive

dataFormat:
Input source color data format, valid values are given below
FVID2_DF_YUV422P, ('P' is not relavent for input data format)
FVID2_DF_YUV444P, ('P' is not relavent for input data format)
FVID2_DF_RGB24_888.
For valid values see Fvid2_DataFormat.

scanFormat:
Input source scan format - interlaced or progressive. For valid values see Fvid2_ScanFormat.

chNum, pitch, fieldMerged, bpp: Not used, set to 0 or default.

Vps_CaptVipOutInfo Vps_CaptVipParams::outStreamInfo[VPS_CAPT_VIP_STREAM_ID_MAX]

Output format for each stream. The number of valid entries should match the numStream parameter provided at create time.

Vps_CaptVipScParams* Vps_CaptVipParams::scPrms

Scaler parameters to use when Vps_CaptCreateParams.outStreamInfo[x].scEnable = TRUE Parameters are ignored when outStreamInfo[x].scEnable = FALSE.

Note: Upscaling is not supported in the inline scaling in capture path because of hardware limitation.

Vps_VipPortConfig* Vps_CaptVipParams::vipPortCfg

VIP Parser port config, set NULL to ignore these parameters.
